name: Go Ria SWING!
description:
Go Ria SWING is a fangame featuring the coolest gorilla ever, Go Ria!
It is a silly endless runner (swinger??) made for Ria's birthday!

How to play

Press and hold the Left mouse button to let go of a liana
Release the mouse button when Ria's hand is on a liana to grab it!
Do that repeatedly and bam, you're swinging forever!

Credits & links

Go Ria design by Go Ria
Font: Dimbo by Jayvee Enaguas
Music: Easy recipe by Make a field Music
SFX: Universal sound FX by Imphenzia
UI: Wooden UI by Rexard
